MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:26pm following a safety concern with the underground cable network due to a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:35 PM on Thursday, 25 March 2021.
